last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: Four contestants prepare their final performances in hopes of earning the title of One True Singer.

name: One True Singer
overview: Fourteen up-and-coming Romanian musicians, singers, and songwriters live and train together as they battle it out for a once-in-a-lifetime record deal and a cash prize.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Musicians from all over Romania audition for a spot in the “One True Singer” house – where fourteen artists will live and train together as they battle it out for a record deal and cash prize.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: TikTok and street performance challenges and a timed “Clash” cover song round push the contestants outside their comfort zones as they fight to stay in the house.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The twelve remaining artists must compose original raps about their fellow competitors before a remix challenge tests their ability to work as a team.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: An epic dance-off followed by a K-Pop “Battle of the Bands” finds the jury more conflicted than ever.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The contestants flex their creativity - and face their biggest fears - for a style challenge and an extreme photoshoot.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The eight remaining contestants have to perform live and win over crowds demanding to be entertained.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The artists must pair up to record a single and film an unforgettable music video if they want to avoid a seriously surprising Clash.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The contestants put together an EP before giving a live-session radio performance… and enduring their first on-air interview.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The six remaining contestants team up with the biggest names on the Romanian music scene to rewrite and perform a hit song. Later, industry experts join the judges for a Clash to remember.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Four contestants prepare their final performances in hopes of earning the title of One True Singer.
